title: Oliber
description:
## The best quality

Oliber is made by simple materials like neoprene, that is a breathable fabric, is soft and won’t generate rubbing on the skin. It has 2 magnets that can hold up to 1 kg. and velcro which makes it very adaptable, better attachment to the stump and is easy to put on.

Oliber is an orthotics for people with atrophied hands such as amputees, hand in cocoon, arthritis or osteoarthritis, which seeks to  provide autonomy when performing daily activities.
